name: SickleCellDiseaseWithCrisis
title: Sickle Cell Disease with Crisis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to identify diagnoses of sickle cell disease with crisis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related toÂ diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify a diagnosis of sickle cell disease with crisis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that identify a diagnosis of sickle cell disease without crisis.)
